item.title: Sticking With MathJax
item.description:
I have considered switching from MathJax to KaTeX for my MathJax-based projects such as TeXMe and MathBin but I had to decide against doing so because MathJax supports commands like \label, \eqref, \notag, etc. and environments like align, multiline, etc. KaTeX does not support them, so switching to KaTeX would break many existing documents written using TeXMe or MathBin. I am going to stick with MathJax for now.

Here are some useful resources:

  • MathJax: Supported TeX/LaTeX commands
  • KaTeX: Supported Functions

Read on website
